title: Drishyam 2 (Hindi)
writer: Jeethu Joseph, Aamil Keeyan Khan, Abhishek Pathak
short_cast: Ajay Devgn, Shriya Saran, Tabu, Akshaye Khanna, Ishita Dutta, Mrunal Jhadav, Rajat Kapoor, Neha Joshi, Saurabh Shukla, Kamlesh Sawant
cast: Ajay Devgn, Shriya Saran, Tabu, Akshaye Khanna, Ishita Dutta, Mrunal Jhadav, Rajat Kapoor, Neha Joshi, Saurabh Shukla, Kamlesh Sawant

desc: Seven years after the case related to Vijay and his family was closed, a series of unexpected events brings a truth to light that threatens to change everything for the Salgaonkars.
